getHierarchyLabels

public static java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.Integer,javax.swing.JLabel> getHierarchyLabels(prefuse.data.Graph[] gs)
Generates hierarchy labels for an array of graphs. Returned in the form of a Dictionary so that labels can be applied to JSliders, which for some reason insist on using the deprecated Dictionary types. Labels are just the number of nodes in the corresponding graph.

Parameters:
gs - the array of graphs to generate labels for
Returns:
a Dictionary containing a mapping of ints (graph indicies) to JLabels which contain the mapping for the int key.

getAltHierarchyLabels

public static java.util.Dictionary<java.lang.Integer,javax.swing.JLabel> getAltHierarchyLabels(prefuse.data.Graph[] gs)
Used to label the overlay slider. Replaces the top (highest population) member of the dictionary with the label "None".

Parameters:
gs - Graph array to use
Returns:
Dictionary of labels

                                 int bottom,
